titles.title: Directing the Committee on the Judiciary to undertake an inquiry into whether grounds exist to impeach Kenneth W. Starr, an independent prosecutor of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 10/7/1998--Introduced. Directs the Committee on the Judiciary: (1) to investigate and report to the House of Representatives whether grounds exist to impeach Kenneth W. Starr; and (2) if it determines that such grounds exist, to report a resolution of impeachment.
